results.content:
Talking way too slow, had to 1.5x to 2x just to remove all the pauses.
Some of the course was either missing information (lodash), or making mistakes, and then fixing them as he went.
Could have used a virtual box and not used sudo for simple npm i commands.
Although i did learn some things, most of it I already knew.

results.content: Introduces a lot  of plugins that are  specific  to his personal workflow. Will work, if you keep to the same workflow and watch out for depreciated plugins.
results.content_html: Introduces a lot of plugins that are specific to his personal workflow. Will work, if you keep to the same workflow and watch out for depreciated plugins.

results.content: Poor presentation and concepts are not explained properly. This course covers very basic concepts, it has nothing that can entitle "Webpack: Complete Developers Guide 2020".
results.content_html: Poor presentation and concepts are not explained properly. This course covers very basic concepts, it has nothing that can entitle "Webpack: Complete Developers Guide 2020".

results.content:
This is really awesome course. It was always pain for developer to setup project from scratch and introduce lot of functionality in project. This was very confusing while searching on google and varies solution depending on versions of libraries so though developer wanted to make his hand dirty or build some POC he was getting stuck and getting delayed due to time consuming process of setup project . This course helped lot on that. Thanks to bring it all in one and easy to understand manner.  
Also this course contains all the necessary and essential topics which all industry standard projects have .
Thanks a lot Eyas to make our life easy and this course helped to build confidence.
It will be great if you make any course to build an application like eCommerce. with latest react concept and this build setup. We would like to subscribe that.
Thanks and keep going strong.!!!

response.content:
I am very shocked to see such a feedback.
Thank you Amit for giving your sincere feeback, we are very glad to provide you such a good learning experience through our courses.
